alert.note: Alert for Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 30 at 12:06PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast South Dakota, including the following counties, Clark, Codington, Day, Deuel, Grant, Hamlin, Marshall and Roberts. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Training thunderstorms may produce heavy rainfall over the watch area through the afternoon and early evening hours. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
